about_the_game:
A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists.

Summary.
Tino, a boy living in a rural farming village, one day meets Silvia, a girl who is a dark wizard, who had collapsed from hunger.
The boy, who has a yearning for magic, decides to go with the girl.
Their little adventure leads to encounters between people who were never meant to meet, intersections of destinies that were never meant to intersect, and the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed.
Why did the Devil Hunt succeed? What on earth are the "shadows" that suddenly appeared several years ago?
This is a story of untying the threads of complex relationships and getting to the truth.

Other Characteristics
- It take 4-6 hours to play this game.
- This game has 2 endings.
- The theme song was composed by Sapporo Momoko. Please watch the movie at the top of this page.

Main Characters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists. The encounter between a boy living in a rural farming village and a girl who is a dark wizard leads to the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed.
